item.title: Shopping Cart
item.description: I'm pushing a shopping cart the wrong way through marked pathways in a mall, even going down the up escalators (the flat kind) and vice versa. mechanics are talking about their cars in the background.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Stick Figure
item.description: G and I enter room #1 in the attic. the first one with a stick figure. it's arranged like a living room. then we continue into room #2, with another stick figure. the light is off, it's like a garage, with a short step down to the concrete floor. I'm …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Dragon
item.description: on a sail boat, we encounter a dragon from the white dragon clan (though he is light red). we strike a deal with him, and he agrees to help us on our vacation by having thousands of tiny dragons gather in the form of a translucent, bouncy VW beetle. we …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Space Coaster
item.description: Beavis and Butthead get on a roller coaster that takes them to space. I'm Beavis. the way we get off the spacecraft onto earth is a long orange extendable tube that you have to climb down. I get on it wrong and hit my head on the ground and everyone …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: For+
item.description: some kind of rollercoaster through a cave. R wants to take a trip to Mexico. later I'm programming with for+ loops. I'm unsure what the + does then I notice it increments the first element in whatever youre iterating. well that's useless.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Six Wheeler
item.description: hanging out with E and other friends. she asks why all her exes have been rich. I ask if she is poor. she says no. I say that's why. my head is in her lap. her friend shows up in a giant armored six wheeled vehicle. we load all our …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Magic Horse
item.description: I'm making a game where when you close your eyes you see (in monochrome, wide angle lens) through the eyes of your magic horse.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Hotel
item.description: at a hotel with B. eating at a diner booth table with him and his mom. I'm counting blocks of table on either side to make sure it's properly asymmetrical. his mom is asked about the beds, it's confusing and we lose the opportunity once we realize they are asking …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Egg
item.description: I am a child or multiple children. the children don't want to play the game where everyone wears these unsettling ceramic masks. mine looks somewhere in between a wailing ape and a gas mask. it's red with flesh colored ridges, thick and polished. we're in a dark place. feels like …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Junk Labyrinth
item.description: I'm escorting my girlfriend and some others down from the top of a giant concrete wall structure that looks like a castle. it's part of a giant circular structure that reminds me of the labyrinth structure in the short story The Immortal. it's filled with junk and debris. the atmosphere …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Abandoned Mall
item.description: I am a young woman. my friends and I are in a large abandoned open-air structure like a mall with giant blown out windows. we come across a man who wants to trap us here. he says if we attack him, his dog will attack us and at least one …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Old Friend
item.description: after leaving S's house, he says I should bring more of our friends instead of hanging out alone. he mentions K, and I say I haven't seen him in years. Suddenly K shows up and we walk home together through the South Hills. it starts raining pretty bad and my …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Parking Lot
item.description: humanity loses to the monsters from the movie Arcadian. the last you see of us is running into the lake next to a parking lot
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Baby
item.description: we grow our baby out of an orange pepper plant. it feels wrong to cook him on the stove until he's nicely browned and fragrant but that's just what you have to do, he won't remember it anyway
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Teacher
item.description: back to school. rude, bald teacher has us fill out a confusing form full of fields to initial with a partner, my partner is N. after class he makes a comment about how I need to stop scratching my crotch so much. I brush it off but I'm really embarrassed …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Sports Car
item.description: sports car on the train tracks. it gets run over, people cheer because they hate sports cars. a woman exits the car looking confused. when I get closer and the paramedics arrive I realize it's R. she seems like maybe she had brain damage or something. the paramedic asks her …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Hitman
item.description: I'm the assassin in a Hitman type scenario. I'm at a sort of crappy hotel. I'm really bad at my job and keep having to restart
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Bus Driver
item.description: the street is crowded with dozens of buses arranged chaotically, not squarely in the lanes. I'm trying to find the one driven by my friend C, so I climb on top and try to walk across them until I find his, 504. hands reach out of the bus windows trying …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Climbing Game
item.description: I've made a climbing game set in a misty forest. you climb these thin vertical slabs of rock embedded in a hill arranged in a U shape. when you reach the top you let go and look toward the open side. you are presented with what would be a nice …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Underground
item.description: obviously hostile creature (stone zombie?) waits until we get off the communal elevator to the bottom of the world to attack me. black haired female monsters with giant spike teeth. underground lake full of creatures trying to eat me. there's a red rock
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: South Hills
item.description: saw a guy get hit by like 3 cars kinda like that scene in the postal movie. he (or i? ambiguously written) walked around and left. I found him in some guys basement, he tried to trap us there. I ran away? whole thing took place on a road in …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Cactus
item.description: a man undergoes increasingly worse torture as legal punishment for consensually performing a BDSM act involving a cactus and a girl
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Homer
item.description: homer simpson discovers art in a corn field, and finds an artifact that lets him engineer with an extra dimension (writer's note: i don't remember what that is supposed to mean). a robot breaks out of his facility looking for him.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Mask Girl
item.description: my new gf got mad when I couldn't tell she came to school wearing a mask of her own face
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Cool Bike
item.description: I'm doing lines down the street on this crazy looking bike with clear plastic wheels. I'm grinding rails and people are watching
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Mechanic
item.description: took my car to the mechanic and the mechanic was H and he stole the car and his name was actually W
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Keychain
item.description: kid tries stealing my keychain right out of my hands
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Astronauts
item.description: Gf and I are astronauts. I eject right at the furthest point I can, for safety concerns. she follows and compliments my initiative and observation.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Rogue Lovers
item.description: two laid back, eccentric adventurers (lovers?) take us aboard after our boat crashes into theirs and sinks. one recounts how they ended up trying to nab some rare cave spider silk and discovered there were more spiders in the cave than hoped. (writer's note: cave spider silk is a material …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Monkey Mask
item.description: an actress is interviewed about her scene in a horror movie where she reacts to the serial killer wearing a freaky looking skin mask that gave him this weird big simian mouth
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Facility
item.description: trying to work together with another guy to escape a facility with a sneaky, strong guy trying to kill us both
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: UFO Operator
item.description: which 2 UFO operators would you pick (featuring Ted Bundy)
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Mecha Show
item.description: a show about kids who can mentally operate robot dinosaurs... it seems wholesome until my friend and I are caught by giant versions of my own t-rex mech and she is brutally killed
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Edible Rock
item.description: an edible rock you crush into powder and use for "structural" parts of recipes
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Magic Mud
item.description: small town in Oregon. built on an incline. surrounding it are giant beautiful hills/mountains and a thick layer of mist. gravity is skewed. nearby "dirt pits" where mud and dirt shifts and floats around in strange shapes. there's a mountain shaped hill, at the top there is a crater …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Tastes Good
item.description: I'm giving oral to [REDACTED FICTIONAL CHARACTER] and she tastes really good.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Birthday Card
item.description: aunt C(?) sends me a birthday card and it makes me cry
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Hatch
item.description: there is a hatch outside my apartment that I want locked to keep someone out, but it won't close all the way. the police and some construction guy show up and we talk about it. everyone is being too loud
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: God of Magic
item.description: I begin worshipping the god of magic. I meet this guy on the road talking about the trigonometric ratios. he asks at some point in this conversation if I'm a virgin. I say, maybe in this lifetime. i ask if he believes in magic. I have a basket of blue …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Mummies
item.description: mummies have spikes on the side so you can climb into their mouths which are at the top of their heads
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Alligator Pistol
item.description: talked about a wearable gun on your thumb called an "alligator pistol". looks like a tiny cannon
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Car Accident
item.description: N has a mental break, gets my mom involved, and is injured in a car accident.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Nude Restaurant
item.description: I, R and another girl(?) sit naked at a restaurant. the other girl goes into the empty kitchen and makes us food using her breast milk. T shows up, wearing makeup, gives me a weird look, and leaves.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Sideways House
item.description: I try to sleep(?) in a sideways house but it looks too unstable. sure enough it crumbles. my mom walks through the wreckage to catch up with me, but we are both caught by fiberglass in the air which cuts our skin. R and I meet up with H, and …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Winners and Losers
item.description: T introduces me to a game he found on 4chan that he does every day. The goal of the game is to "parkour run" your way through whatever you can and complete objectives. e.g. T runs through somebody's back yard and then through another house's living room. teams are …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Stomach Wound
item.description: I shot myself in the stomach by accident. nobody will take me to the hospital
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Bus Stop
item.description: dad, brother, grandparents, aunt and uncle all waiting at the bus stop to go to a wedding. Dad and I realize we forgot our wedding attire, so we run back
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Bald
item.description: guy in my dream shaves his head bald because he wants to be more intimidating. "every villain in every movie is bald!" he's got a figure that looks exactly like him, but in evil robes
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Tape
item.description: "game of thrones" book 1 was a vhs tape titled LIL WAYNE: THE ESSENTIALS
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Twitter Death
item.description: twitter user @B died and i learned from the account via a family member
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Invader
item.description: playing a game like dark souls. I beat an invader who is wielding a whip. there is an enemy who looks like a smiling witch with a big head. I'm in some kind of a run-down cottage.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Play
item.description: N writes and "performs" a "play" in G's history class (it really is just a video he plays on the projector). the script was really good when he wrote it but at some point along the production process it changed direction. it begins with him monologuing over footage of a …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Meme Class
item.description: in high school. we're learning about memes in social studies. D keeps entering the room but realizes it's not his class
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Computer Music
item.description: N was here, and took an ativan. I woke up in the dream, it was still dark and my computer was playing strange music, it sounded like backwards drums and droning noises
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Hair
item.description: I had huge dyed scene hair and bangs. when I look in the mirror I have terrible dandruff and my scalp starts to separate from my head like a wig.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Missing School
item.description: I am about to go to school, but decide to miss the bus and have sex with R instead. we are interrupted because she is hungry(?) and needs to eat.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Hybrid
item.description: I beat someone in a game that looks like both GunZ: The Duel, and Roblox
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Oxygen
item.description: I'm jumping around in low gravity at a gathering with my family, somewhere in the city, in a strange large building. I forgot to get my oxygen device so I'm holding my breath jumping around trying to find the exit, and I do just in time. I find my cousin …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Motorcycle
item.description: camera follows me in fixed steps. I get on motorcycle with the goal to near miss
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Body Shot
item.description: I'm outside at a park in the city thinking about 7g(?), a new internet service where you buy bagged internet and pop a hole in the bag to let it slowly fill your home. the bags are like little Amazon prime packages. I'm thinking about how these might negatively affect …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Trail
item.description: I'm lying on my back, riding a skateboard down a trail
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Racer
item.description: Played a racing game sort of like f zero. M2k angling is when you control a character underneath the floor
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Laundry Girl
item.description: I pay a girl to do my laundry. She asks me out. I say no, because I have a partner already.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Live Wires
item.description: I'm fighting another robot. we fight by throwing live wires from our bodies onto each other's main processing unit
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Bedsheets
item.description: About to go climbing with G. But first, an attractive person cuts up bedsheets to preserve my soul.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Police Officer
item.description: I am naked, a child. A police officer who looks like Kamala Harris viciously beats and interrogates me in an alley. Nearby, I can see over the heads of pedestrians a red or green square indicating whether or not they are positive for COVID. The police officer is one of …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Red Rose
item.description: A masked woman. Another woman cries as new people phase in and out of reality next to her. We live in some kind of mansion with different sections... I can't remember the significance. There's a large foyer with golden marble walls, floors, pillars. Looks like the bank from the Matrix …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Sidewalk
item.description: After a false awakening, R and I go on a walk to the nearby market. This time we use the sidewalk on the right of the street instead of our typical left, but I don't find that to be unusual. Whenever I look at her face, I can't remember if …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Children
item.description: This town is in disrepair. On my bike ride my companion and I are accosted. We walk into a family's house. They are very poor, and neglectful of their children. An infant shrieks and squirms in its mother's arms. Another woman walks by and bludgeons it to death with a …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Rubber Suit
item.description: As a homework assignment, I made a rubber suit of myself with help from friends. But when the due date comes, I forget to bring it.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Sheep Farm
item.description: I visit a ranch. There is a sheep farm. I am eating dinner, outside, at a long table with the farmer on one side and I on the other. The sheep are held up by their necks so that they learn to stand upright. The sheep are eating alongside us …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Spelunky 3D
item.description: We were going to play Spelunky 3D with the latest graphics mod, but K does not like the "Long Baby" model for the baby character. I do the Gangnam Style dance, but T is not impressed. It's not until I start flossing and vibrating across the mall floor that he …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Monte Carlo
item.description: I'm in British Columbia, but it's on the other side of the continent, and is named Monte Carlo. I want to explore, but I began work at [local call center] and could not leave my hotel room. I leave anyway. Exploring the building, there's a lot of people especially in …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: UFO
item.description: I am in a taxi cab car on the highway in a forest. I vividly see a UFO.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Cambodian Boat Sim
item.description: I learn all about different kinds of boating games, from realistic to "arcade." In Cambodia, boat games will have a blue energy wall if you stray too far. Some people have similar boating game setups to those car sim rigs with steering wheels and such.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Roll
item.description: I'm in a relationship with R from school, and we live in an apartment with a few others. I'm in bed with him. The apartment is trashed. His roommates mention he's kind of a creep. I didn't believe them until he says (which appears in a FF style text box …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Floating Structure
item.description: I'm trapped in Hell, or something. I have to complete difficult tasks to not be tortured. The one I finally failed was to count all instances of the number 12 in some (insurance?) document. We were floating in a void, on some strange structure. My captor was not visible to …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Santa Monica
item.description: At a gymnastics convention/competition. I enter an event which involves diving from very high in the air onto solid ground. I don't stick the landing, but I'm alright. I get a participation trophy. I think the convention was held at the Santa Monica pier.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Tiger Man
item.description: Talking tiger turns out to be rapper dressed in rubber costume, in order to attract female party-goers. I have to uncover all the (covered) furniture as a minigame. Little suitcases that self-consciously shut themselves when you look at them are "points" I want to collect.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Gary
item.description: Due to a technicality in the voting process, Gary Coleman is now the president of the US. When asked "what he was talking about, Willis," he responded, "please, come up with a new joke." This dream took place entirely inside Twitter.
item.dc:creator: ivy sly

item.title: Monkey Mountain
item.description: A monkey loses his sponsorship after a climbing injury in the jungle gym. I explain this to another monkey on a very thin ledge at the top of a humongous mountain. The monkey falls off the ledge, then so do I. We fall into the expansive jungle. I distinctly remember …
item.dc:creator: ivy sly
